snippet: A string of assaults in Baghdad and around the country followed 19 killings over the weekend that made December one of Iraq’s bloodiest months in five years.
abstract: More than 70 people are killed in a string of attacks across Iraq, including a group of 12 Shiites who were pulled from a bus and shot while they were traveling from Mosul to Baghdad to begin an annual religious pilgrimage.
lead_paragraph: A string of assaults in Baghdad and around the country followed 19 killings over the weekend that made December one of Iraq’s bloodiest months in five years.

headline.main: Dozens of Iraqis Killed in Attacks
headline.print_headline: Iraq: Dozens Killed in Wave of Attacks
